Verify the 'Login' button is visible, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, font weight 500, border radius 4px, width 100px, height 40px, and padding 10px
Verify the 'Login' button focused background color transitions to #0056b3 over 200ms

Verify the product name text 'Premium Widget v2.0' has font family 'Roboto', font size 24px, color #333333, font weight 700, text align 'left', margin-top 10px, margin-bottom 15px, x position 20px, y position 80px, and width 500px

Verify the search input field's placeholder text is 'Search products by name...', width 300px, height 40px, border 1px solid #cccccc, border radius 5px, left offset 50px, top offset 20px, and value font size 16px
Confirm the search input field becomes focused on page load

Verify the user avatar image has source 'profile_lg.jpg', rendered dimensions 50x50px, border radius 50%, alt text 'User profile picture', loaded within 50ms, natural dimensions 200x200px, is visible, has margin-right 10px, y-coordinate 25px, and opacity 1

Confirm the shopping cart icon is visible, displays count '3' items, has aria-label 'Shopping Cart with 3 items', x-coordinate 90% of viewport width (1440px viewport), width 24px, height 24px, color #333333, padding 2px, and background color transparent
Ensure the video player is not muted, has width 800px, height 450px, source 'promo_video.mp4', is visible, has background color #000000, and x position 50px
Ensure the 'Fullscreen' button is enabled
Confirm the play button's opacity changes from 1 to 0.7 over a 300ms transition when the video plays
Verify the 'Email' input has label 'Email address', width 250px, height 35px, border 1px solid #ced4da, border radius 4px, and is visible
Verify the 'Subscribe' button has background color rgb(46,139,87), text color #ffffff, font size 16px, padding 8px 15px, and is visible
Verify there are 5 visible pagination links, each 30px wide, 30px high, with border 1px solid #dddddd, and border radius 3px
Verify the '2' pagination link is active/selected with background #007bff, text color #ffffff, font weight 700, and margin-left 5px
Confirm 4 gallery thumbnails are displayed, each 100px wide, 75px high, with margin-right 10px, natural dimension 1200x900px, source 'thumb_N.jpg', alt text 'Product view N', and are visible
Confirm gallery thumbnails on hover have a 150ms transition changing their border to 2px solid #007bff

Verify the error message 'Invalid credentials.' is visible, has font size 14px, color #dc3545, background color #f8d7da, padding 8px, border 1px solid #f5c6cb, top position 20px below the input field, and width 300px
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link is visible, has font size 16px, font weight 400, padding 5px 10px, is left aligned, and x-coordinate 100px
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link becomes focused after tab key press
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link color changes to #0056b3 from #007bff on hover over 300ms transition
Confirm the 'Back to Top' button is hidden initially

Confirm the 'Back to Top' button becomes visible when scroll-top is greater than 300px, has width 50px, height 50px, border radius 50%, background color #6c757d, right offset 20px, bottom offset 20px, and its internal icon has color #ffffff

Ensure the product price '99.99' has font size 20px, font weight 700, color #28a745, font family 'Arial', left margin 5px from the currency symbol, padding-left 2px, is visible, y-coordinate 300px, and background color transparent

Verify the date picker input's value is '2023-10-27', placeholder is 'Select a date', width 150px, height 38px, border 1px solid #ced4da, border radius 4px, background color #ffffff, is enabled, is visible, and x-coordinate 100px

Check the 'Download Report' button is enabled, has background color #17a2b8, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, font weight 600, padding 10px 20px, rendered shape is a rectangle with border radius 5px, width 180px, and height 40px
Confirm 3 social media icons are displayed in a horizontal alignment, each 32x32px, with margin-right 10px, are visible, and have border radius 50%
Confirm the 'Facebook' icon has source 'facebook.svg', alt text 'Facebook', and is loaded within 30ms

Verify the hero banner image has source 'banner_home.jpg', is loaded within 100ms, covers full width of viewport (1920px at desktop), has semi-transparent dark watermark with opacity 0.3 and text 'Demo Site', natural dimensions 3840x1080px, is visible, and height 500px
Ensure the quantity selector has current value '1', border 1px solid #ced4da, border radius 4px, background color #f8f9fa, is visible, width 120px, and height 40px
Ensure the increment button of the quantity selector is enabled
Ensure the decrement button of the quantity selector is disabled when the value is '1'

Check that when the 'Language' dropdown is active, the 'English' option has background color #e9ecef, text color #212529, font weight 500, font size 15px, padding 8px 12px, height 30px, is visible, and x-coordinate 200px
